data.message: I am being marked as one to win 950,000.00 from you right now. Contact name is McClellan Margie Joyce. What is going on?

replies.message: Hey Sierra, this sounds like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/22JpClb. Thanks! -Kate

I see my face under this Sweepstakes seeker something and I don't know what it is or how it got there. believe me I am NOT asking anybody for any money. Now it is a hoax I'm sure and whoever put my face on there may be playing a hoax they have a good idea who it may be
Sierra..I did not do this and I did report. please please contact me back as soon as you get this message
I do not understand. The contact person was McClellan Margie Joyce. I know nothing about  Laurel Mcgready

Yesterday and today, I receive 2 notices that FACEBOOK was awarding me half a million dollas as a wiiner  in zuckerberg drawings....each notice was different...one from a woman...one from a man....both had different winning numbers that I was issued....WHATS GOING ON?????? Ruthie Steele.
Sorry. It is called scams. Report it to Facebook and let them investigate

Hey Ruthie. Thanks for checking in with us. This sounds like a hoax. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1mINLqQ. -Jordan
